content:
• Full professor in Mathematics of Artificial Intelligence (0.8-1.0 fte)
  • https://www.mathjobs.org/jobs/list/21556
  • Leiden, Netherlands
  • Deadline: 23 Jan 2023

The job add explicitly mentions:

Typical examples of important research topics include [...] AI for mathematical theorem discovery
This is in the mahematics department, it seems! That's a really interesting step forward!
